Hero.title: Eternalizing stories on skin
Hero.locale: Located in Porto Feliz - São Paulo

Styles.fine_line_description: Delicate and precise lines that create minimalist and elegant designs.
Styles.micro_realism_description: Highly detailed tattoos that mimic the appearance of photographs on a small scale.
Styles.floral_description: Designs inspired by flowers and elements of nature, often with a delicate and artistic touch.
Styles.ornamental_description: Intricate and symmetrical patterns, often inspired by decorative and cultural art.

Contact.content1: Each project is unique and personalized, developed through a collaborative process that begins with a detailed consultation to understand your vision, collaboratively between the client and the tattoo artist.
Contact.content2: The artwork will only be created after scheduling and payment of the tattoo deposit.
Contact.content3: The designs are always exclusive and created according to the client's request and taste, aiming to be unique and correspond to the proposed meaning.
Contact.content4: Once tattooed on you, it will never be reproduced (by me) on another person.
Contact.content5: The quote can be done via Direct or WhatsApp.
Contact.content6: To start our project, send a message with:
Contact.content8: • Body location where you want to tattoo
Contact.content9: • Approximate size of the tattoo in centimeters
Contact.content10: • Visual references (photos, images, videos, etc.) that inspire the creation of your exclusive artwork
Contact.content11: I do not copy artwork from other tattoo artists. It is possible to use them as a base or inspiration, but the purpose is to create something unique and special for you.
Contact.content12: Exceptions are made for tattoos of known characters or generic designs (phrases, stars, hearts, etc.), standardized and well-known designs.
